title: If the existing FSI is less than the permissible FSI then the owner may opt for development up to permissible FSI by availing TDR/Additional FSI on payment of premium as per Regulation 30
clause_text: If the existing FSI is less than the permissible FSI then the owner may opt for development up to permissible FSI by availing TDR/Additional FSI on payment of premium as per Regulation 30.
section: 33(6) Reconstruction of buildings destroyed by fire or which have collapsed or which have been demolished under lawful order

source_pdf.text_snippet: If the existing FSI is less than the permissible FSI then the owner may opt for development up to permissible FSI by availing TDR/Additional FSI on payment of premium as per Regulation 30.
